title: The Near East 10000 Years Of History - Isaac Asimov
description:
Author: Isaac Asimov

Title: The Near East: 10.000 Years Of History

Contents: 1968 by Isaac Asimov. The author tells the story of the land between two rivers - the Tigris and the Euphrates - where civilization began. Asimov describes history of Near East region (focusing on Mesopotamia) from early Sumerian days (5000+ BC) until few years after WW2 and creation of modern states in the region.

About OCR: I think it's the first ever scan of this book. I plan to do (slowly) scans also of other Asimov's History books, as they are written in quite understandable language
